mapper.select: SELECT q.qnum, q.title, q.author, q.qdate, q.content, q.hit, a.anum, a.title as atitle, a.author as a_author, a.adate, a.hit as ahit, a.content as a_content, attsize, attname, attid FROM queBoard q LEFT OUTER JOIN ansBoard a ON q.qnum = a. qnum LEFT OUTER JOIN attach c ON q.qnum= c.qnum ORDER BY q.qnum DESC, a.anum ASC;
